queries.query: SELECT c.seat_id, se.seat_number FROM tickets t JOIN cinema_infos c ON t.cinema_info_id = c.cinema_info_id JOIN schedules s ON s.schedule_id = c.schedule_id JOIN seats se ON se.seat_id = c.seat_id WHERE t.cancel_status = 'N' AND s.schedule_id = ?
SELECT s.seat_id, s.seat_number FROM seats s WHERE s.seat_number = ?;
SELECT m.movie_title, s.schedule_start_time FROM schedules s JOIN movies m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id WHERE s.schedule_id = ?;
SELECT s.schedule_id, s.schedule_start_time, m.movie_id, m.movie_title, m.movie_price FROM Schedules s JOIN Movies m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id;
INSERT INTO users (user_nickname, user_password, user_status, user_created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE users SET username = ?, email = ?, password_hash = ?, role_id = ? WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_nickname = ? AND user_password = ?
